name: Perdition (itch)
description:
A man wakes up on a rooftop below a veil of pollution. He can barely walk and his mouth is wired shut.

This game adheres to the following themes:

  • 1. Castle on top of a high rise building
  • 20. Mouth Wired Shut
  • 18. Incurable Will to Live

These were selected at random for the Salt World Winter Jam 2013.

It's a Unity game. If you have problems with a low frame rate you might want to turn down particles as there are a lot of them in the atmosphere.

Now available for OSX!

Enjoy.
